sentences.en: Decked out in old - fashioned white gowns, they still look sensational.
sentences.cn: [即使]穿上 旧式 的白色长袍, 她们看起来仍然不同凡响.

sentences.en: Experts agreed that this was a truly sensational performance.
sentences.cn: 专家们一致认为这的确是一场精彩绝伦的演出。

sentences.en: He performed a sensational acrobatic feat.
sentences.cn: 他表演了一套惊人的杂技功夫。

sentences.en: If he was given a good act, he could make It'sensational.
sentences.cn: 如果他得到的是场好戏, 他就能使它变得激动人心.

sentences.en: It is only the sensational that sells news magazines.
sentences.cn: 只有轰动性的事件才能促进新闻杂志的销售。

sentences.en: Its beautiful rays are a sensational sight during an eclipse.
sentences.cn: 它那美丽的光线在日食时景象非常壮观.

sentences.en: Papers of this kind are full of sensational news reports.
sentences.cn: 这类报纸满是耸人听闻的新闻报道.

sentences.en: The arrival of a taxi was unusual enough; an unknown woman getting out of it was sensational.
sentences.cn: 来了辆出租车就够奇怪的了, 从里面出来一名陌生女子就更引人注目.

sentences.en: The show was a sensational success.
sentences.cn: 这次演出取得了轰动性的成功。

sentences.en: The Soviet's call for a new Geneva Conference was a sensational event.
sentences.cn: 苏联要求召开新的日内瓦会议是一件耸人听闻的大事.

sentences.en: The world champions suffered a sensational defeat.
sentences.cn: 世界冠军遭遇惨败，引起了一片哗然。

sentences.en: Their call for a new Geneva conference was a sensational event.
sentences.cn: 他们要求召开新的日内瓦会议是一件耸人听闻的大事.

sentences.en: This time Josef's news had been sensational.
sentences.cn: 这次约瑟夫的消息是惊人的.

sentences.en: What a sensational story! It has all the elements of a soap opera.
sentences.cn: 多麽耸人听闻的事! 具备连续剧的一切要素.
